Review after playing for almost 10 years already. It's still a legendary game that I love.

>went to local gas station
>shot it up
>planted a bomb
>went home
>played csgo

>see a guy
>shoot him
>miss every shot
>he turns around
>kills me in one shot
>exit cs:go
